info.name: morpho-shorts-factory
info.description: Complete API collection for Morpho Shorts Factory

item.name: health-check

request.description: Basic liveness check - returns ok if service is running
Readiness check - verifies database connection and service health

item.description: Health check endpoints for service monitoring

item.name: auth

request.description:
Register a new user account. Returns user object and JWT token.

Required fields:
- email (valid email format)
- password (min 8 characters)

Optional fields:
- username (3-30 characters)
- displayName (1-100 characters)

Login with email and password. Returns user object and JWT token.

Required fields:
- email
- password

Get current authenticated user profile. Requires valid JWT token in Authorization header.

This is a protected route example - token is automatically used from environment variable.

item.description: Authentication endpoints - login, register, and user management

item.name: test
TikTok

request.description: Search and return top TikTok videos by niche/keyword. Returns video metadata without downloading.

Full TikTok workflow: Search top videos, download them, and upload to GCS.

Body parameters:
- niche: Search keyword/niche
- count: Number of videos to process
- username: User folder name (defaults to 'testuser')

item.description: TikTok scraping and download test endpoints

item.name: YouTube

query.description: Number of videos to return (default: 10, max: 50)

request.description: Search YouTube videos by keyword. Returns video metadata including title, description, channel, and thumbnail.
Search for raw footage videos on YouTube. Automatically searches multiple queries like 'football raw footage', 'football unedited footage', 'football training footage', etc.

Download a single YouTube video and upload to GCS.

Body parameters:
- videoId: YouTube video ID (from URL)
- username: User folder name (defaults to 'testuser')

Full YouTube workflow: Search for raw footage, download videos, and upload to GCS.

Body parameters:
- niche: Topic/niche for raw footage search
- count: Number of videos to process (default: 3)
- username: User folder name (defaults to 'testuser')

Note: Requires YOUTUBE_API_KEY in .env file

item.description: YouTube scraping and download test endpoints - for raw footage content
Test endpoints for video scraping and processing workflows

item.name: football

query.description: Number of demo matches to generate (default: 20)

request.description: Generate realistic demo football match data with stats, social metrics, and scores. Useful for testing the match ranking algorithm.

query.description: Maximum number of matches to return (default: 10)

request.description:
Rank football matches by excitement score (0-130 points). Scores based on:
- Goals (0-40 pts)
- Action/Shots (0-30 pts)
- Drama/Cards (0-15 pts)
- Social Engagement (0-30 pts)
- Match Importance (0-15 pts)

Filters matches by minimum goals, excitement score, date range, and preferred leagues.

Detect highlight moments in a football match (goals, saves, cards, penalties). Currently returns mock data - will integrate AI detection:
- Audio analysis (crowd noise spikes)
- Computer vision (ball tracking, celebrations)
- OCR (scoreboard changes)
- ML model (trained on highlights)

Complete football highlights workflow:
1. Generate 30 demo matches
2. Rank by excitement score (min 60 pts, 2+ goals)
3. Select top 5 matches
4. Detect highlights in #1 match

Returns full breakdown of scoring and highlight segments.

item.description: Football Match Intelligence - Smart match selection and highlight extraction. Algorithm ranks matches 0-130 points based on excitement factors.

item.name: football-real-data

request.description:
Get reference for all available league IDs:
- Premier League (39)
- La Liga (140)
- Bundesliga (78)
- Serie A (135)
- Ligue 1 (61)
- Champions League (2)
- Europa League (3)

No API key required for this endpoint.

Fetch all finished matches from today across all leagues. Returns match data with:
- Final scores
- Match statistics (shots, cards, etc.)
- League information

Requires: FOOTBALL_API_KEY in .env

Get today's most exciting matches, ranked by algorithm.

**Parameters:**
- `limit`: Number of matches (default: 5)
- `minGoals`: Minimum goals (default: 2)
- `minExcitementScore`: Min score 0-130 (default: 60)
- `enrichSocial`: Add YouTube views (slower, default: false)

**Use Case:** Daily highlight compilation

Requires: FOOTBALL_API_KEY in .env

Get all available rounds for a league.

**Example:**
- Premier League (39): "Regular Season - 1", "Regular Season - 2", ...
- Champions League (2): "Group Stage - 1", "Round of 16", ...

**League IDs:**
- 39 = Premier League
- 140 = La Liga
- 78 = Bundesliga
- 135 = Serie A
- 61 = Ligue 1

Get all finished matches from a specific league round.

**Examples:**
- Premier League Round 18: `/league/39/round/Regular Season - 18`
- La Liga Round 15: `/league/140/round/Regular Season - 15`
- Champions League: `/league/2/round/Round of 16`

Note: URL encode the round name (spaces become %20)

Get the best matches from a specific league round, ranked by excitement.

**Use Case:** Weekly league roundup

**Example Workflow:**
1. Get rounds: `/league/39/rounds`
2. Pick latest round
3. Get best matches: `/league/39/round/{latest}/ranked?limit=5`
4. Download highlights from YouTube
5. Create compilation video

Requires: FOOTBALL_API_KEY in .env

item.description: Real Football Data - Fetch actual match data from API-Football. Requires FOOTBALL_API_KEY in .env (free tier: 100 requests/day). Use these endpoints to get real match statistics, scores, and details from any league.

item.name: football-scraping

request.description:
Get FotMob league IDs for web scraping.

**FREE, NO API KEY, CURRENT DATA!**

League IDs:
- Premier League (47)
- La Liga (87)
- Bundesliga (54)
- Serie A (55)
- Ligue 1 (53)
- Champions League (42)
- Europa League (73)

No setup required - works immediately!

Get all finished matches from today using FotMob web scraping.

**Advantages:**
- ✅ FREE (no API key)
- ✅ CURRENT season data (2024-2025)
- ✅ Works immediately
- ✅ Basic match data

Use enrichStats=true to get detailed statistics.

Get today's most exciting matches from FotMob, ranked by algorithm.

**BEST ENDPOINT FOR DAILY HIGHLIGHTS!**

**Parameters:**
- `limit`: Number of matches (default: 5)
- `minGoals`: Minimum goals (default: 2)
- `minExcitementScore`: Min score 0-130 (default: 60)
- `enrichStats`: Fetch detailed match stats (default: false)
- `enrichSocial`: Add YouTube views (default: false)

**Use Case:** Daily highlight compilation with CURRENT data

**No API key required!**

Get all finished Premier League matches from FotMob.

**League IDs:**
- 47 = Premier League
- 87 = La Liga
- 54 = Bundesliga
- 55 = Serie A
- 53 = Ligue 1
- 42 = Champions League
- 73 = Europa League

Returns recent finished matches from the current season.

item.name: Get Premier League Best Matches (Scraped + Ranked)

request.description:
Get the best Premier League matches, ranked by excitement.

**Use Case:** Weekly Premier League highlight compilation

**Example for other leagues:**
- La Liga: `/scraper/league/87/ranked`
- Bundesliga: `/scraper/league/54/ranked`
- Serie A: `/scraper/league/55/ranked`
- Champions League: `/scraper/league/42/ranked`

**No API key required!**

Get top 3 La Liga matches with detailed stats.

Perfect for creating "Best of La Liga" compilations.

Get the best Champions League matches.

Perfect for "UCL Best Goals" compilations.

item.description: Football Web Scraping (FotMob) - Get CURRENT season data (2024-2025) for FREE! No API key required. Scrapes match data from FotMob's public API. Perfect for daily highlights and current season content.
